activities: FCA US LLC may transfer personal data from the EU to the United States in connection with the operation of its business.  Personal data is collected from potential and hired employees and is used for internal purposes, including system access, payroll and benefits, training, security, reporting, and global corporate directories.  FCA US LLC may receive and process personal data of consumers, workforce, vendors, suppliers and others in connection with the manufacture, distribution and sale of automobiles and related goods and services in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.
contacttitle1: Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary of FCA US LLC
corpofftitle1: VP & CIO/VP Corporate Audit and Compliance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Automobiles & Light Trucks/Vans - (AUT)Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)
personaldata: Personal data processed includes that for consumers, workforce, vendors, suppliers and others in connection with the manufacture, distribution and sale of automobiles and related goods and services in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland.  Data covered includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
